question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Transaction Analysis] The AnalyzedTransaction type contains transaction analysis results - can malicious analysis results bypass safety checks in the execution engine? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Dependency Graph Attack] Can an attacker craft a transaction dependency graph that causes exponential blowup in execution time, leading to validator performance degradation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Cross-Shard Amplification] Can a single malicious transaction in the global executor trigger excessive cross-shard communication, amplifying its impact across all shards? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Reentrancy] Can global transactions recursively call back into the global executor through cross-shard messages, causing reentrancy issues or stack overflow? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Transaction Timeout] Is there a timeout mechanism for global transaction execution? Can stuck transactions cause indefinite blocking and loss of liveness? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: new()] [Multiple Initialization] Can GlobalExecutor::new() be called multiple times with different parameters to create conflicting executor instances? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: get_executor_thread_pool()] [Thread Pool Abuse] Can external code obtain the thread pool via get_executor_thread_pool() and spawn malicious tasks that interfere with transaction execution? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Struct: GlobalExecutor] [Send/Sync Safety] The manual Sync + Send bounds on StateView - can custom implementations violate these bounds at runtime despite compile-time checks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: new()] [Panic Safety] If the ThreadPoolBuilder panics during construction, are resources properly cleaned up or can this lead to resource leaks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Borrow Checker Bypass] Does the use of Arc circumvent borrow checker protections? Can mutable aliasing occur through Arc interior mutability? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Config Clone Safety] The BlockExecutorConfigFromOnchain is not cloned but passed directly - is it safely shared? Can modifications affect concurrent executions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Default Config Override] The BlockExecutorLocalConfig::default_with_concurrency_level() creates defaults - can critical non-default settings be bypassed, affecting safety? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [TransactionWithDependencies Validation] Are the dependencies in TransactionWithDependencies validated to be within the same block? Can cross-block dependencies cause issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [AnalyzedTransaction Trust] The AnalyzedTransaction type suggests pre-analysis - is this analysis trusted or re-validated? Can malicious analysis bypass execution checks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Dependency Graph Complexity] Can attackers craft dependency graphs with worst-case complexity (e.g., all transactions depend on each other), causing O(nÂ²) or worse performance? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Thread Pool Saturation] Can a large batch of global transactions saturate the thread pool, preventing other critical operations from executing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Coordinator Synchronization] How does the global executor synchronize with the coordinator and individual shards? Can race conditions during block execution cause state inconsistencies? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Aggregator Service Interaction] Does the global executor properly coordinate with the sharded_aggregator_service? Can aggregation happen before global transactions complete, causing incorrect state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Module Cache Isolation] The execution uses AptosModuleCacheManager - does the global executor use a separate cache? Can cache poisoning from shard execution affect global transactions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Zero-Dependency Transactions] If all global transactions have empty dependencies, does execution properly parallelize or does it fall back to sequential execution? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Transaction Order Preservation] The comments indicate global transactions execute after shards - is this ordering strictly enforced? Can reordering cause safety violations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [VMStatus Error Codes] Different VMStatus error codes may have different severity - are all errors treated equally or can low-severity errors mask critical failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: execute_global_txns()] [Gas Accounting] For global transactions that depend on cross-shard data, is gas properly accounted for the cross-shard reads? Can this be exploited for gas-free state access? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/sharded_block_executor/global_executor.rs] [Function: new()] [CPU Affinity] Does the thread pool allow setting CPU affinity? Can threads migrate between cores causing performance variability and potential timing-based attacks? (Low)
